WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 03 NOV
   BY M/V VANTAGE TOWING SIX 150 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-19.00S 042-24.00W, 24-48.00S 042-09.00W,
   24-59.00S 042-34.00W, 24-30.00S 042-49.00W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 04 NOV 18.
